paragraphs.text: The Social Bots node contains children nodes for each messaging bot. These messaging bots are used to configure the third party applications used to send announcements and receive incoming commands.
At present Superalgos only supports the Telegram messaging application.

definition.text: A Social Bots node is used to define the bots for each messaging application. These messaging bots are used to send announcements and receive commands used to interact with Superalgos.
